name: Tenebrosa Aranea
description:
After the planned assassination of your former friend, you enter his house in search of his most valuable possession.

Tenebrosa Aranea is a short sound-based horror game that revolves around a man desperately trying to collect money while avoiding a spider-like creature that wanders the rooms.

This game contains 2 endings and playtime can range from 10-15 minutes.

This took a while to make so any donations or support would be appreciated :)
